content.raw: Looking at the “official” support that we are delivering in our binaries \(see [https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo7-release/src/default/ubuntu/debian/control](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo7-release/src/default/ubuntu/debian/control)\) my personal feeling would be to replicate what we have in these packages. Seems like for gazebo7 the ign-transport support was not used for binaries \(we can comment the block out in the yaml file to reflect the fact that it is optional\) and we are using ign-math2 and sdf4 in the debian control file.
content.html: Looking at the “official” support that we are delivering in our binaries (see https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo7-release/src/default/ubuntu/debian/control) my personal feeling would be to replicate what we have in these packages. Seems like for gazebo7 the ign-transport support was not used for binaries (we can comment the block out in the yaml file to reflect the fact that it is optional) and we are using ign-math2 and sdf4 in the debian control file.
